Functions
create_connection
def create_connection(
db_file
)

create a database connection to the SQLite database specified by db_file

Parameters
db_file

database file

Returns

Connection object or None

create_table

conn,
create_table_sql
)

Parameters

Connection object

create_table_sql

Returns
